title: IOT Workshop
description: This workshop will introduce you to the Internet of Things and how to build your own IoT devices using the ESP8266 microcontroller.

title: Web Development Workshop
description: This workshop will introduce you to the basics of web development and how to build your own website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Mobile App Development Workshop
description: This workshop will introduce you to the basics of mobile app development and how to build your own app using React Native.

title: Machine Learning Workshop
description: This workshop will introduce you to the basics of machine learning and how to build your own machine learning model using Python.

title: Blockchain Workshop
description: This workshop will introduce you to the basics of blockchain technology and how to build your own blockchain using Ethereum.

title: Cybersecurity Workshop
description: This workshop will introduce you to the basics of cybersecurity and how to secure your online presence.
